title: 问路
situation: You're lost and need to ask for directions to the subway station.

turns.speaker: user
turns.translation: Excuse me, where is the subway station?

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 往前走，到路口左拐，大概五分钟。
turns.pinyin: Wǎng qián zǒu, dào lùkǒu zuǒ guǎi, dàgài wǔ fēnzhōng.
turns.translation: Go straight, turn left at the intersection, about five minutes.
